|zh                 = 
;今天是九条裟罗的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''派蒙：'''裟罗，快看我们给你带了什么礼物！
:'''派蒙：'''锵锵&mdash;&mdash;
:'''派蒙：'''最新款的御，御…
:'''九条裟罗：'''是「御建鸣神主尊大御所大人像」。
:'''派蒙：'''对对，我们可是花了好大力气才抢到的！
:'''九条裟罗：'''二位费心了。这次的「御建鸣神主尊大御所大人像」只限现场抢购，可惜我有公务在身，未能到场。没想到竟能…
:'''九条裟罗：'''非常感谢二位。
|dialogue_review_zh = 这次的『御建鸣神主尊大御所大人像』只限现场抢购，可惜我有公务在身，未能到场。没想到竟能…
|en                 =
;Today is [[Kujou Sara]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Paimon:''' Sara, quick! Come look at our present for you!
:'''Paimon:''' Tada&mdash;!
:'''Paimon:''' It's the newest model of the Statue of... of...
:'''Kujou Sara:''' "Statue of Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, God of Thunder."
:'''Paimon:''' Yeah, that! It took us a lot of effort to get it, you know!
:'''Kujou Sara:''' Thank you for the trouble, you two. The Statue of Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, God of Thunder this time was limited to a doorbuster sale, but I had official duties to attend to and wasn't able to go. I never thought that I would...
:'''Kujou Sara:''' Thank you so much, you two.
